msg: More clarification of hierarchical versus opaque

author: fielding
msg: fix misleading example of a misleading URI

author: fielding
msg: fixes and clarification in response to comments from Ian Jacobs,
Martin Duerst, and Mike Brown.  Put the ":" back into userinfo.
Rewrite all vague recommendations into what an application should do.
Define well-known ports and make avoidance of bogus requests normative.
Make the restrictions on password in userinfo normative and useful.
Make an empty path default to localhost for all new schemes.
Add equivalence rules for all optional delimiters and defaults.
Clarify the definition of secondary resource for fragment.

author: fielding
msg: Reduce syntax of IPvFuture and give it a meaningful name
